Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointmentController
AddAppointmentController class is used to handle adding an appointment.
AddCustomerController
AddCustomerController class is used to add a customer.
AlertUtils
This class is used to display alerts to the user.
Appointment
This class is as a model for appointments
AppointmentDao
AppointmentDao class is used to add, delete, and get all appointments.

AppointmentsMonthType
 
Contact
This class is as a model for contacts
ContactDao
This class is a data access object for contacts
Context
This class is used to store the user id and user name of the logged in user
Country
This class is as a model for countries
Customer
This class is used to store the division id, division name, and country id of a division
CustomerDao
This class is a data access object for customers
Division
This class is used to store the division id, division name, and country id of a division

HomeController class is used to handle the home screen.

LocationDao
This class is a data access object for locations

LoginController class is used to handle login.
Main
 
ModAppointmentController
ModAppointmentController class is used to modify an appointment.

ModCustomerController class is used to modify a customer.
Navigate
This class is used to navigate between scenes.

This class contains methods for querying the database.
